column2: The Patrikos, Patricius or in english, Patrician, was a member of the ruling class of the Roman Republic, the title continued on as an honorific one into to the Roman Empire, and is considered quite prestigious
The Spatharii were once members of class of imperial bodyguards, the title is now purely honorific, however
Originally denoting the leader of the Spatharii, the title is now purely honorific
Originally denoting the elected leaders of the Roman Republic, this title is now a very prestigious honorific
The Dromos, or Cursus in Latin, is the head of the department of the Public Post as well as one of the most senior fiscal ministers of the empire
The Keeper of the Imperial Inkstand, which the emperor uses to sign state documents
Literally "The one who sleeps nearby", this position denotes one of the highest position for a eunuch in the empire, guarding the emperors bedchamber
The High Chamberlain of the Great Palace, this posiition is nominally the highest position for a eunuch in the empire
